name: Slimy Life
description:
Slimy life is a submission to the Virtus new beggining game jam.

Story:

Help the slimes evolve and learn new things, from being small and slow to being strong and fast!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Run

F - Grab mode enable/disable

LMB - Throw object

Update After the Game Jam: There was a bug preventing players from finishing the game, when players got to the end of the game, the game would get locked, and would only display "Need: 3 Fruits" when reaching the finish.

Credits: Stefan Nikolich

The game was made in roughly 2 days, so if you encounter any  bugs or just have some feedback please do let me know. Other then that enjoy!

THANKS!
